title: Decedent's net probate estate
context: ยง560:2-204 Decedent&rsquo;s net probate estate. The value of the augmented estate includes the value of the decedent&rsquo;s probate estate, reduced by funeral and administration expenses, homestead allowance, family allowances, exempt property, and enforceable claims. [L 1996, c 288, pt of ยง1]
